collection-target.influx-query: SELECT assetId, assetLabel, customerId, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_reads, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_evicted, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_read_ahead_rnd, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_read_requests, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_write_requests, mysql_global_status_innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free FROM MySQL WHERE assetId='__ASSET_ID__' AND time > now() - 5m
